item.title: Casino Royale teaser
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: I'm pretty impressed by this, it doesn't show an awful lot but I might actually have to go out and see Casino Royale. Daniel Craig looks like he might pull it off. Link on YouTube if the video doesn't work embedded.
